page.title: 13DAY IN THE LIFE OF A PARENT
page.content: Mother and father have breakfast about 7a.m. Father attends to the School heating before going to work on a farm about 4 miles away. Later, daughters get ready for school, eldest one catches the bus to St Andrews for Secondary School, younger daughter only has a few yards to go to Dunino Primary School. Mother checks School as she is the caretaker. At around 9 a.m. mother does the washing, tidies the house and prepares the evening meal. At mid-day mother goes to serve the school meals. In the afternoon, mother takes the dog for a walk and does some weeding in the garden. Around 4p.m. daughters come home from school. Mother goes back to work at the school. Girls watch T.V. for a while and play with the dog. Father arrives home from work about 5p.m.
